title: Analytics
summary: TPI across 19 domains with anomaly detection and forecasting.
description: Total Productivity Intelligence across 19 operational domains with advanced anomaly detection and predictive forecasting capabilities.
howItWorks: Analytics processes real-time data streams from all platform apps, applies machine learning models for pattern recognition and anomaly detection, then generates insights and forecasts through our TPI framework.
security: SOC2 Type II compliant with tenant isolation, role-based access controls, and encrypted data transmission. All analytics data is anonymized and aggregated according to GDPR standards.
roadmap: Enhanced ML models for predictive maintenance
Real-time streaming analytics with Apache Kafka
Advanced visualization with custom chart libraries

title: Loadboard
summary: Marketplace + execution: posting, bidding, award, and live tracking.
description: Comprehensive freight marketplace with intelligent matching, real-time tracking, and execution management capabilities.
capabilities: Live GPS tracking with geofence alerts
howItWorks: Shippers post loads with requirements, carriers bid with capacity and pricing, and our algorithm matches based on location, equipment, and performance metrics. Once awarded, real-time tracking begins with automated updates.
security: End-to-end encryption for all communications, secure payment processing, and comprehensive audit trails for all marketplace transactions.

title: Carrier
summary: Execution telemetry linking drivers, vehicles, and on-time metrics.
description: Comprehensive carrier management with real-time telemetry, performance tracking, and safety monitoring.
howItWorks: IoT sensors collect real-time data from vehicles and drivers, which is processed through our telemetry engine to provide performance insights, safety alerts, and optimization recommendations.
security: Secure IoT device authentication, encrypted telemetry data transmission, and privacy-compliant driver monitoring with explicit consent management.

title: Emissions
summary: Trip-level capture, rollups, intensity metrics, and target tracking.
description: Comprehensive carbon emissions tracking and management with trip-level granularity and target-based reporting.
howItWorks: Emissions data is captured at the trip level using vehicle telemetry, fuel consumption data, and route optimization. This data is aggregated and analyzed against sustainability targets with automated reporting.
security: Secure data collection from multiple sources, compliance with environmental regulations, and audit trails for all emissions reporting.

title: Intelligence
summary: Multi-domain risk scoring and location briefs with executive reports.
description: Advanced risk intelligence platform providing multi-domain scoring, location analysis, and executive reporting capabilities.
howItWorks: Intelligence aggregates data from multiple sources including weather, traffic, crime, economic indicators, and geopolitical events to generate comprehensive risk scores for locations and operations.
security: Secure intelligence data sources, classified information handling protocols, and role-based access to sensitive risk assessments.

title: Procurement
summary: Requisition to PO with RFQs, contracts, supplier scoring, and spend controls.
description: End-to-end procurement management from requisition to payment with intelligent supplier management and spend analytics.
howItWorks: Procurement streamlines the entire purchasing process from initial requisition through supplier selection, contract management, and payment processing with built-in compliance and analytics.
security: Secure supplier data management, encrypted contract storage, and comprehensive audit trails for all procurement activities.

title: Rating
summary: 0-100 composite with decay, normalization, tiers, and disputes.
description: Comprehensive rating system providing 0-100 composite scores with intelligent decay, normalization, and tier management.
howItWorks: Rating combines multiple performance indicators into a single composite score, applies intelligent decay to reflect recent performance, and normalizes scores across different operational contexts.
security: Secure rating data collection, tamper-proof score calculation, and comprehensive audit trails for all rating decisions and disputes.

title: Inventory
summary: Real-time stock, ABC analysis, forecasting, and audits.
description: Advanced inventory management with real-time tracking, intelligent forecasting, and comprehensive audit capabilities.
howItWorks: Inventory integrates with warehouse systems and IoT sensors to provide real-time stock levels, applies ABC analysis for optimization, and uses machine learning for demand forecasting.
security: Secure inventory data management, encrypted lot/serial tracking, and comprehensive audit trails for all inventory movements and adjustments.

title: Security
summary: Fail-closed SECaaS with tenant isolation, throttling, and auditing.
description: Comprehensive Security-as-a-Service platform with fail-closed controls, tenant isolation, and advanced threat detection.
howItWorks: Security operates as a foundational service, implementing fail-closed controls, monitoring all system access, and providing real-time threat detection and response capabilities.
security: SOC2 Type II, GDPR, and NIST compliant with comprehensive security controls, regular penetration testing, and continuous security monitoring.

title: Trust Pilot
summary: Public reviews with moderation, discovery, and insights.
description: Comprehensive review and reputation management platform with intelligent moderation and analytics capabilities.
howItWorks: Trust Pilot collects reviews from multiple touchpoints, applies AI moderation for quality control, and provides comprehensive analytics for reputation management and improvement.
security: Secure review data collection, privacy-compliant moderation, and protection against fraudulent review attempts with advanced detection algorithms.

title: Warehouse
summary: Dock/door scheduling, capacity, compliance & safety metrics.
description: Comprehensive warehouse management with dock scheduling, capacity optimization, and safety compliance monitoring.
howItWorks: Warehouse integrates with dock management systems, capacity planning tools, and safety monitoring devices to provide comprehensive warehouse operations management and optimization.
security: Secure warehouse data management, encrypted mobile communications, and comprehensive audit trails for all warehouse operations and safety incidents.

title: Broker
summary: Freight brokerage with automated matching and execution management.
description: Advanced freight brokerage platform with intelligent matching algorithms and comprehensive execution management.
howItWorks: Broker connects shippers with carriers through intelligent matching algorithms, manages pricing and contracts, and provides comprehensive execution tracking and compliance monitoring.
security: Secure brokerage data management, encrypted financial transactions, and comprehensive audit trails for all brokerage activities and compliance requirements.
